mapper.select:
select sol.*, va1.attr_name as operateTypeName, va2.attr_name as operateStatusName from sys_operate_log sol left join (select attr_value, attr_name from v_sys_dict_attr where dict_code = 'operate-type') va1 on va1.attr_value = cast(sol.operate_type as varchar) left join (select attr_value, attr_name from v_sys_dict_attr where dict_code = 'operate-status') va2 on va2.attr_value = cast(sol.operate_status as varchar) where 1 = 1
and sol.operate_user_name like concat('%', #{operateUserName}, '%')
and sol.description like concat('%', #{description}, '%')
and sol.operate_type = #{operateType}
and sol.operate_status = #{operateStatus}
and sol.operate_time >= to_timestamp(#{operateTime_start},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
and sol.operate_time < to_timestamp(#{operateTime_end},'yyyy-MM-dd hh24:mi:ss')
